articles.title: Inside Bari Weiss’s Decision to Pull a ‘60 Minutes’ Segment
articles.mainIdea: Inside Bari Weiss’s Decision to Pull a ‘60 Minutes’ Segment
articles.summary: The Wall Street Journal: Inside Bari Weiss’s Decision to Pull a ‘60 Minutes’ Segment. A conflict over the CBS News editor in chief’s decision to hold a segment spotlights the internal tensions over editorial standards.

articles.title: Trump’s First-Term Trust Buster Is Now Working to Get Paramount Its Deal
articles.mainIdea: Trump’s First-Term Trust Buster Is Now Working to Get Paramount Its Deal
articles.summary: The Wall Street Journal: Trump’s First-Term Trust Buster Is Now Working to Get Paramount Its Deal. Former Justice Department antitrust chief Makan Delrahim is at the center of Paramount’s bid to wrestle Warner Bros. from Netflix.
